gamerule.clearDreamItems.description: Apaga o inventario do Jogador quando entra na dimensão Além do Sonho pela primeira vez
config.true_end.entry.cleardreamitems.to: If true, clears player's inventory at their first-time entry to Beyond The Dream (once and never again)
config.true_end.entry.randomevents.title: Random Events
Random Events depend on this, as a chance in a tick or when player performs an action
config.true_end.entry.entityspawning.too: Determines the chance of how often the entity spawns to stalk the player every minute

config.true_end.entry.btdconvodelay.tool: Time in ticks between messages of 'The Voices' at first entry to Beyond The Dream
config.true_end.entry.pop_ups.title: Window Pop-Ups
